title: Sand casting: an art adventure
creator_credit: Centron Films, Easy Street Productions and Bill Mackie
brief_description: Shows a young woman and several children making sand casts of several objects. The adult demonstrator shows the step by step procedure for making and decorating plaster of paris castings using inexpensive materials. Suitable for upper primary level.
